alert.note: Alert for Coryell; Lampasas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 26 at 7:06PM CDT until April 26 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Coryell County in central Texas... Central Lampasas County in central Texas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Evant, or 19 miles south of Hamilton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Copperas Cove, Gatesville, Fort Hood, Kempner, Evant, Fort Gates, South Mountain, Arnett, Moline, Izoro, Rumley, Purmela, Adamsville, Pearl, South Purmela, Bee House, King, Topsey, Pidcoke and Mound. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
